remarks: Implicit substitution inference for ordered pairs.  Compare ~ copsex2ga .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-2014.)
statement:
copsex2ga.1 $e |- ( A = <. x , y >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
copsex2gb $p |- ( E. x E. y ( A = <. x , y >. /\ ps ) <-> ( A e. ( _V X. _V ) /\ ph ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ph x y $.
